content.name: X4:RE and Extensions including Trey's Sectors - Rise of the Ossian Raider Community Compatibility Patch
content.description: This patch ensures seamless compatibility between X4: Reemergence, Trey's Sectors Reemergence Patch Standalone, and the Rise of the Ossian Raider mod series, integrating additional sector expansions and balance adjustments. It requires dependencies such as Variety and Rebalance Overhaul and X4: RE Expansion - Skull and Bones, ensuring a cohesive gameplay experience.
content.author: iomatix

dependency.name: Rise of the Ossian Raider Part 2
